00022 double
00023 SpectrumSolver::icAIC(double loglikelifood, int k, int /*n*/) {
00024     return -2 * loglikelifood + 2 * k;
00025 }
00026 double
00027 SpectrumSolver::icAICc(double loglikelifood, int k, int n) {
00028     return -2 * loglikelifood + 2 * (k + 1) * n / (double)(n - k - 2);
00029 }
00030 double
00031 SpectrumSolver::icHQ(double loglikelifood, int k, int n) {
00032     return -2 * loglikelifood + 2 * k * log(log(n) / log(2.0));
00033 }
00034 double
00035 SpectrumSolver::icMDL(double loglikelifood, int k, int n) {
00036     return -loglikelifood + k * log(n) / 2.0;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void
00040 SpectrumSolver::genIFFT(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& wavein) {
00041     m_ifftN->exec(wavein, m_ifft);
00042     int n = wavein.size();
00043     double k = 1.0 / n;
00044     std::complex<double> *pifft = &m_ifft[0];
00045     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00046         *pifft *= k;
00047         pifft++;
00048     }   
00049 }
00050 
00051 void
00052 SpectrumSolver::window(int t, int t0, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc,
00053     double windowlength, std::vector<double> &window) {
00054     double wk = 1.0 / windowLength(t, t0, windowlength);
00055     window.resize(t);
00056     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00057         window[i] = windowfunc((i + t0) * wk);
00058     }
00059 }
00060 void
00061 SpectrumSolver::exec(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin, std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memout,
00062     int t0, double torr, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc, double windowlength) throw (XKameError&) {
00063     windowlength = std::max(0.0, windowlength);
00064     unsigned int t = memin.size();
00065     unsigned int n = memout.size();
00066     if (m_ifft.size() != n) {
00067         m_fftN.reset(new FFT(-1, n));       
00068         m_ifftN.reset(new FFT(1, n));       
00069         m_ifft.resize(n);
00070     }
00071     m_peaks.clear();
00072 
00073     if(hasWeighting()) {
00074         genSpectrum(memin, memout, t0, torr, windowfunc, windowlength);     
00075     }
00076     else {
00077     //Rectangular window.   
00078         double wlen = windowLength(t, t0, windowlength);
00079         int idx1 = std::max(0, std::min((int)memin.size() - 1, -t0 + (int)lrint(wlen / 2.0)));
00080         int idx0 = std::min(std::max(0, -t0 - (int)lrint(wlen / 2.0)), idx1);
00081         std::vector<std::complex<double> > memin1(idx1 + 1 - idx0);
00082         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < memin1.size(); i++)
00083             memin1[i] = memin[i + idx0];
00084         t0 += idx0;
00085         genSpectrum(memin1, memout, t0, torr, windowfunc, 1.0);     
00086     }
00087     
00088     std::sort(m_peaks.begin(), m_peaks.end(), std::greater<std::pair<double, double> >());
00089 //  std::reverse(m_peaks.begin(), m_peaks.end());
00090 }
00091 
00092 void
00093 SpectrumSolver::autoCorrelation(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >&wave,
00094     std::vector<std::complex<double> >&corr) {
00095     if(!m_fftRX || (m_fftRX->length() != wave.size())) {
00096         int len = FFT::fitLength(wave.size() * 2);
00097         m_fftRX.reset(new FFT(-1, len));
00098         m_ifftRX.reset(new FFT(1, len));
00099     }
00100     std::vector<std::complex<double> > wavezf(m_fftRX->length(), 0.0), corrzf(m_fftRX->length());
00101     std::copy(wave.begin(), wave.end(), wavezf.begin());
00102     m_fftRX->exec(wavezf, corrzf);
00103     for(int i = 0; i < corrzf.size(); i++)
00104         wavezf[i] = std::norm(corrzf[i]);
00105     m_ifftRX->exec(wavezf, corrzf);
00106     corr.resize(wave.size());
00107     double normalize = 1.0 / (corr.size() * m_fftRX->length());
00108     for(int i = 0; i < corr.size(); i++) {
00109         corr[i] = corrzf[i] * normalize;
00110     }
00111 }
00112 double
00113 SpectrumSolver::lspe(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& wavein, int origin,
00114     const std::vector<double>& psd, std::vector<std::complex<double> >& waveout,
00115     double tol, bool powfit, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc) {
00116     int t = wavein.size();
00117     int n = waveout.size();
00118     int t0a = origin;
00119     if(t0a < 0)
00120         t0a += (-t0a / n + 1) * n;
00121     
00122     std::vector<std::complex<double> > wavezf(n, 0.0);
00123     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00124         int j = (t0a + i) % n;
00125         wavezf[j] = wavein[i];
00126     }
00127     m_fftN->exec(wavezf, waveout);
00128     
00129     // Initial values.
00130     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00131         std::complex<double> z = waveout[i];
00132         waveout[i] = z * sqrt(psd[i] / std::norm(z));
00133     }
00134     genIFFT(waveout);
00135     
00136     std::vector<double> weight;
00137     window(t, origin, windowfunc, 1.0, weight);
00138     
00139     double sigma20 = 0.0, sigma2 = 0.0, coeff = 1.0;
00140     for(int it = 0; it < 20; it++) {
00141         double ns2 = stepLSPE(wavein, origin, psd, waveout, powfit, coeff, weight);
00142         if(it == 0)
00143             sigma20 = ns2;
00144         dbgPrint(formatString("LSPE: err=%g, coeff=%g, it=%u\n", ns2, coeff, it));
00145         genIFFT(waveout);
00146         if((it > 3) && (sigma2 - ns2  < sigma20 * tol)) {
00147             break;
00148         }
00149         sigma2 = ns2;
00150     }
00151     return coeff;
00152 }
00153 double
00154 SpectrumSolver::stepLSPE(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& wavein, int origin,
00155     const std::vector<double>& psd, std::vector<std::complex<double> >& waveout,
00156     bool powfit, double &coeff, const std::vector<double> &weight) {
00157     int t = wavein.size();
00158     int n = waveout.size();
00159     int t0a = origin;
00160     if(t0a < 0)
00161         t0a += (-t0a / n + 1) * n;
00162     double dcoeff = 1.0;
00163     if(powfit) {
00164         double den = 0.0;
00165         double nom = 0.0;
00166         for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00167             double w = weight[i];
00168             int j = (t0a + i) % n;
00169             std::complex<double> z = m_ifft[j];
00170             den += std::norm(z) * w;
00171             nom += std::real(std::conj(wavein[i]) * z) * w;
00172         }
00173         dcoeff = nom / den;
00174         coeff *= dcoeff;
00175     }
00176     std::vector<std::complex<double> > zfin(n, 0.0), zfout(n);
00177     double sigma2 = 0.0;
00178     double sumw = 0.0;
00179     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00180         double w = weight[i];
00181         sumw += w;
00182         int j = (t0a + i) % n;
00183         std::complex<double> z = dcoeff * m_ifft[j] - wavein[i];
00184         zfin[j] = z * w;
00185         sigma2 += std::norm(z) * w;
00186     }
00187     m_fftN->exec(zfin, zfout);
00188     double sor = 1.0 / sumw;
00189     double wdiag = dcoeff * sor * sumw;
00190     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00191         std::complex<double> z = - (zfout[i] - waveout[i] * wdiag);
00192         waveout[i] = coeff * z * sqrt(psd[i] / std::norm(z));
00193     }
00194     return sigma2;
00195 }
00196 
00197 double
00198 SpectrumSolver::windowLength(int t, int t0, double windowlength) {
00199     return 2.0 * (std::max(-t0, (int)t + t0) * windowlength);
00200 }
00201 
00202 double
00203 SpectrumSolver::numberOfNoises(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin) {
00204     int t = memin.size();
00205     int n = fftlen();
00206     
00207     std::vector<std::complex<double> > zfin(n), zfft(n);
00208     std::fill(zfin.begin(), zfin.end(), 0.0);
00209     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00210         zfin[i % n] = memin[i];
00211     }
00212     m_fftN->exec(zfin, zfft);
00213 
00214     double ssum = 0.0, s2sum = 0.0;
00215     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00216         double s = std::abs(zfft[i]);
00217         ssum += s;
00218         s2sum += s*s;
00219     }
00220     double num = ssum*ssum/s2sum/n*t;
00221 //  fprintf(stderr, "# of noises = %g, ratio=%f\n", num, num/t);
00222     return num;
00223 }
00224 
00225 void
00226 FFTSolver::genSpectrum(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& fftin, std::vector<std::complex<double> >& fftout,
00227     int t0, double /*torr*/, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc, double windowlength) {
00228     unsigned int t = fftin.size();
00229     unsigned int n = fftout.size();
00230     int t0a = t0;
00231     if(t0a < 0)
00232         t0a += (-t0a / n + 1) * n;
00233 
00234     std::vector<double> weight;
00235     window(t, t0, windowfunc, windowlength, weight);
00236     std::fill(m_ifft.begin(), m_ifft.end(), 0.0);
00237     std::vector<std::complex<double> > zffftin(n, 0.0), fftout2(n);
00238     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00239         int j = (t0a + i) % n;
00240         m_ifft[j] = fftin[i] * weight[i];
00241         zffftin[j] = m_ifft[j] * (double)(t0 + i) * std::complex<double>(0, -1);
00242     }
00243     m_fftN->exec(m_ifft, fftout);
00244     m_fftN->exec(zffftin, fftout2);
00245 
00246     //Peak detection. Sub-resolution detection for smooth curves.
00247     std::vector<double> dy(n); //Derivative.
00248     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00249         dy[i] = std::real(fftout2[i] * std::conj(fftout[i]));
00250     }
00251     for(int ip = 0; ip < n; ip++) {
00252         int in = (ip + 1) % n;
00253         if((dy[ip] > 0) && (dy[in] < 0)) {
00254             double dx = - dy[ip] / (dy[in] - dy[ip]);
00255 //          dx = std::max(0.0, std::min(dx, 1.0));
00256             if((dx >= 0) && (dx <= 1.0)) {
00257 /*
00258             std::complex<double> z = 0.0, xn = 1.0,
00259                 x = std::polar(1.0, -2 * M_PI * (dx + i - 1) / (double)n);
00260             for(int j = 0; j < t; j++) {
00261                 z += fftin[j] * w * xn;
00262                 xn *= x;
00263             }
00264             double r = std::abs(z);
00265 */
00266                 double r = std::abs(fftout[ip] * (1 - dx) + fftout[in] * dx);
00267                 m_peaks.push_back(std::pair<double, double>(r, dx + ip));
00268             }
00269         }
00270     }
00271 }

00273 MEMStrict::~MEMStrict() {
00274 }
00275 
00276 void
00277 MEMStrict::setup(unsigned int t, unsigned int n) {
00278     if (m_lambda.size() != t) {
00279         m_fftT.reset(new FFT(-1, t));
00280         m_accumDY.resize(t);
00281         m_accumDYFT.resize(t);
00282         m_lambda.resize(t);
00283         m_accumG2.resize(t);
00284     }
00285 }
00286 void
00287 MEMStrict::solveZ(double tol) {
00288     unsigned int size = m_accumDYFT.size();
00289     std::vector<double> dy2(size);
00290     std::vector<double> &g2(m_accumG2);
00291 
00292     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00293         dy2[i] = std::norm(m_accumDYFT[i]);
00294     }
00295     for(unsigned int it = 0; it < lrint(log(size) + 2); it++) {
00296         double k = 2 * m_accumZ * m_accumZ;
00297         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00298             g2[i] = lambertW0(k * dy2[i]) * 0.5;
00299         }
00300         double nsumz = 0.0;
00301         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00302             nsumz += exp(g2[i]);
00303         }
00304         double err = fabs(nsumz - m_accumZ) / nsumz;
00305         m_accumZ = nsumz;
00306         if(err < tol) {
00307 //          fprintf(stderr, "MEM: Z solved w/ it=%u,err=%g\n", it, err);
00308             break;
00309         }
00310     }
00311 }
00312 
00313 void
00314 MEMStrict::genSpectrum(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin, std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memout,
00315     int t0, double tol, FFT::twindowfunc /*windowfunc*/, double /*windowlength*/) {
00316     int t = memin.size();
00317     int n = memout.size();
00318     if(t0 < 0)
00319         t0 += (-t0 / n + 1) * n;
00320     setup(t, n);
00321     double sqrtpow = 0.0;
00322     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < memin.size(); i++)
00323         sqrtpow += std::norm(memin[i]);
00324     sqrtpow = sqrt(sqrtpow);
00325     double err = sqrtpow;
00326     double alpha = 0.3;
00327     for(double sigma = sqrtpow / 4.0; sigma < sqrtpow; sigma *= 1.2) {
00328         //  fprintf(stderr, "MEM: Using T=%u,N=%u,sigma=%g\n", t,n,sigma);
00329         std::fill(m_accumDYFT.begin(), m_accumDYFT.end(), 0.0);
00330         std::fill(m_ifft.begin(), m_ifft.end(), 0.0);
00331         std::fill(m_lambda.begin(), m_lambda.end(), 0.0);
00332         std::fill(m_accumDY.begin(), m_accumDY.end(), 0.0);
00333         std::fill(m_accumG2.begin(), m_accumG2.end(), 0.0);
00334         m_accumZ = t;
00335         double oerr = sqrtpow;
00336         unsigned int it;
00337         for(it = 0; it < 50; it++) {
00338             err = stepMEM(memin, memout, alpha, sigma, t0, tol);
00339             if(err < tol * sqrtpow) {
00340                 break;
00341             }
00342             if(err > sqrtpow * 1.1) {
00343                 break;
00344             }
00345             if(err > oerr * 1.0) {
00346                 break;
00347             }
00348             oerr = err;
00349         }
00350         if(err < tol * sqrtpow) {
00351             dbgPrint(formatString("MEM: Converged w/ sigma=%g, alpha=%g, err=%g, it=%u\n", sigma, alpha, err, it));
00352             double osqrtpow = 0.0;
00353             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < memout.size(); i++)
00354                 osqrtpow += std::norm(memout[i]);
00355             osqrtpow = sqrt(osqrtpow / n);
00356             dbgPrint(formatString("MEM: Pout/Pin=%g\n", osqrtpow/sqrtpow));
00357             break;
00358         }
00359         else {
00360             dbgPrint(formatString("MEM: Failed w/ sigma=%g, alpha=%g, err=%g, it=%u\n", sigma, alpha, err, it));
00361         }
00362     }
00363     if(err >= tol * sqrtpow) {
00364         dbgPrint(formatString("MEM: Use ZF-FFT instead.\n"));
00365         std::fill(m_ifft.begin(), m_ifft.end(), 0.0);
00366         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00367             m_ifft[(t0 + i) % n] = memin[i];
00368         }
00369         m_fftN->exec(m_ifft, memout);           
00370     }
00371 
00372     std::vector<std::complex<double> > zffftin(n), fftout2(n);
00373     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00374         zffftin[i] = m_ifft[i] * (double)((i >= n/2) ? (i - n) : i) * std::complex<double>(0, -1);
00375     }
00376     
00377     //Peak detection. Sub-resolution detection for smooth curves.
00378     m_fftN->exec(zffftin, fftout2);
00379     std::vector<double> dy(n);
00380     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00381         dy[i] = std::real(fftout2[i] * std::conj(memout[i])); //Derivative.
00382     }
00383     for(int ip = 0; ip < n; ip++) {
00384         int in = (ip + 1) % n;
00385         if((dy[ip] > 0) && (dy[in] < 0)) {
00386             double dx = - dy[ip] / (dy[in] - dy[ip]);
00387             if((dx >= 0) && (dx <= 1.0)) {
00388                 double r = std::abs(memout[ip] * (1 - dx) + memout[in] * dx);
00389                 m_peaks.push_back(std::pair<double, double>(r, dx + ip));
00390             }
00391         }
00392     }   
00393 }
00394 double
00395 MEMStrict::stepMEM(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin, std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memout, 
00396     double alpha, double sigma, int t0, double tol) {
00397     unsigned int n = m_ifft.size();
00398     unsigned int t = memin.size();
00399     double isigma = 1.0 / sigma;
00400     std::vector<std::complex<double> > &lambdaZF(m_ifft);
00401     std::fill(lambdaZF.begin(), lambdaZF.end(), 0.0);
00402     std::complex<double> *plambda = &m_lambda[0];
00403     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00404         lambdaZF[(t0 + i) % n] = *plambda * isigma;
00405         plambda++;
00406     }
00407     m_ifftN->exec(lambdaZF, memout);
00408     std::vector<double> pfz(n);
00409     double sumz = 0.0;
00410     double *ppfz = &pfz[0];
00411     std::complex<double> *pmemout = &memout[0];
00412     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00413         *ppfz = exp(std::norm(*pmemout));
00414         sumz += *ppfz++;
00415         pmemout++;
00416     }
00417     double k = 2.0 * sigma / sumz * n;
00418     ppfz = &pfz[0];
00419     pmemout = &memout[0];
00420     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00421         double p = k * *ppfz++;
00422         *pmemout = std::conj(*pmemout) * p;
00423         pmemout++;
00424     }
00425     genIFFT(memout);
00426 
00427     k = alpha / t / sigma / 2;
00428     double err = 0.0;
00429     const std::complex<double> *pmemin = &memin[0];
00430     std::complex<double> *pout = &m_accumDY[0];
00431     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00432         std::complex<double> *pifft = &m_ifft[(t0 + i) % n];
00433         std::complex<double> dy = *pmemin - *pifft;
00434         pmemin++;
00435         err += std::norm(dy);
00436         *pout += dy * k;
00437         pout++;
00438     }
00439     err = sqrt(err);
00440     
00441     m_fftT->exec(m_accumDY, m_accumDYFT);
00442     solveZ(tol);
00443     k = sigma / t;
00444     pout = &m_accumDYFT[0];
00445     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00446         double p = k * sqrt(m_accumG2[i] / (std::norm(*pout)));
00447         *pout = std::conj(*pout) * p;
00448         pout++;
00449     }
00450     m_fftT->exec(m_accumDYFT, m_lambda);
00451     return err;
00452 }
